full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Contract Reference

* **title-titre-eng**: Request for Information (RFI) - Document Automation for Unit4 Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)
* **title-titre-fra**: Demande de renseignements (DR) - Automatisation des documents pour le système Planification des ressources de l'entreprise (PRE) Unit4
* **referenceNumber-numeroReference**: CB-6702-98788360

### Tender Details

* **solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation**: 106205.114
* **tenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture**: 2023-08-15 14:00:00 (Expired)
* **expectedContractStartDate-dateDebutContratPrevue**: 2023-09-01
* **expectedContractEndDate-dateFinContratPrevue**: 2024-03-31

### Procurement Information

* **procurementCategory-categorieApprovisionnement**: SRV
* **procurementMethod-methodeApprovisionnement**: Non-competitive
* **tradeAgreements-accordsCommerciaux**: None

### Description

The Canadian Commercial Corporation (CCC) is seeking computer programming services to automate data entry into the current ERP (Unit4 Business World) from various PDF documents. The proposed solution should be able to extract data and read forms from text PDF documents, extract data, and write to the ERP system. Experience with Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) solutions to automate data sharing between organizations is also of interest.

The ideal solution will be "turnkey," complete, and ready to use, without requiring additional development, integration, or testing. The proposed solution will replace manual data entry tasks, which are resource-intensive and prone to human error.

### Contact Information

* **contactInfoName-informationsContactNom**: Kathee Nash
* **contactInfoEmail-informationsContactCourriel**: [bids@ccc.ca](mailto:bids@ccc.ca)
* **contactInfoPhone-contactInfoTelephone**: (343) 573-1229

### Attachments

The tender documents, including the RFI, Addendum No. 1, and Addendum No. 2, are available for download at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/...).

### Region of Opportunity

This tender is open to bidders in Canada.
